author: Special Correspondent
V S
text:
CULTURE

Isha Yoga Centre: Yaksha – A celestial event of music, dance and spirit, Malladi Brothers – Carnatic – Vocal Duo, Vellingiri Foot Hills, 6.45 p.m.

GENERAL

Karpagam University: 8{+t}{+h}Annual Day, Sekkizhar Auditorium, 10.30 a.m.

Ladies Wing of Malayalee Suhruthi Sangham : International Women’s Day, ND Hall, COINDIA, 2{+n}{+d}Floor, SIEMA Building, Race Course – Opp to Thomas Park, 4.30 p.m.

Avinashilingam University: National Science Day, Thiruchitrambalam Auditorium, 10.30 a.m.

Sree Sakthi Engineering College: Scientia 16, SSEC Seminar Hall, 9.30 a.m.

PSG STEP: Headstart Startup Saturday, PSG Tech, 3 p.m.

Nehru Arts and Science College: Annual Day and Adieu, PK Das Auditorium, Nehru Gardens, TM Palayam, 10 a.m.

Dr.SNS Rajalakshmi College of Arts and Science: Zenith 16 – HR Conclave, 10 a.m.

SNS Academy – CBSE School: Hilarity 16, Thudiyalur – Saravanampatti Road, 4 p.m.

CMS College of Science and Commerce: 28{+t}{+h}Annual Sports Day, Arjuna Awardee and four time Olympian Shiny Wilson takes part, 9.30 a.m.

Kumaraguru College of Technology: KCT Mini DIRT Bike 2016 race, near West Gate, Saravanampatty, 9.30 a.m.

Dhanalakshmi Srinivasan College of Engineering: Technical Seminar, 9.30 a.m.

KPR Institute of Engineering and Technology: International Conference, Tanam Hall, 9 a.m.

Institute of Cost Accountants of India: International Women’s Day, SFI Apartment – 3{+r}{+d}Floor, Sathyamoorthy Road, Ram Nagar, 6 p.m.

Info Institute of Engineering: Workshop, Sathy Road, Kovilpalayam, 9 a.m.

Hindusthan Institute of Technology: Inauguration of Students Forum, Seminar Hall, 11 a.m.

POLLACHI

Mahatma Gandhi Ashram and Inner Wheel Club – Coimbatore West: Dedication of houses constructed for tribal people, Sethumadai, 11 a.m.

SATHYAMANGALAM

Bannari Amman Institute of Technology: Inauguration of Salzer – BIT Innovation Centre, Inauguration of Aquasub – BIT Research Centre, BIT Achiever Award Function and Farewell to Final year students, Institute premises, 10.30 a.m.
title: In Coimbatore Today
